Spring Annotations.val: Annotate all your service classes with @Service
Annotate all your DAO classes with @Repository
Annotate your other components (e.g. resource classes) with @Component
Auto-wire other beans into your classes using @Autowired
Use @Scope to change scope for autodetected components

Spring MVC Annotations.val: Use @RequestMapping to map URLs onto an entire class or a particular handler method
Use @PathVariable on a method argument to bind it to the value of a URI template variable
Bind request parameters to method variables using @RequestParam

Spring Security Annotations.val: Authorize or deny a functionality using @PreAuthorize
